---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## flat() function

返回展平的 Iterable/AsyncIterable。如果第一个参数是数字,则执行更多层级的展平 `flat([[[1,2]]], 2) // [1,2]`

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function flat<
  A extends Iterable<unknown> | AsyncIterable<unknown>,
  B extends number = 1,
>(iterator: A, depth?: B): ReturnFlatType<A, B>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = flat([1, [2, 3], [[4, 5]]]);
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 1}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 2}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 3}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: [4, 5]}
iter.next(); // {done:true, value: undefined}

// with pipe
pipe([1, [2, 3], [[4, 5]]], flat, toArray); // [1, 2, 3, [4, 5]]

await pipe(Promise.resolve([1, [2, 3], [[4, 5]]]), flat, toArray); // [1, 2, 3, [4, 5]]
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-flat-6t2in)

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/flat.ts)
